text: Gomɗii Men nulirii Nulaaɓe Amen ɓen ɓanngannduyeeji, Men jippindinani ɓe Defte e sariyaare, fii no yimɓe ɓen ñiiɓira e nunɗal. Men jippini kadi njamndi ndin, ndi doole tiiɗuɗe woni e mun e nafooje wonannde yimɓe ɓen, e no Allah feññinira ɓen wallooɓe Mo e Nulaaɗo Makko on ka wirnii. Pellet, Allah ko Jom cemmbe, Fooluɗo. @Corrected
